lead_paragraph: The soccer agency Gestifute has denied that clients including Portuguese star Cristiano Ronaldo and Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho are involved in any tax evasion after a media consortium reported that they had used tax havens to handle tens of millions of euros in earnings.

headline.print_headline: Agency Denies Tax Evasion by Ronaldo and Mourinho
headline.main: Agency Denies Tax Evasion by Ronaldo and Mourinho
